title: NAFISUL HAQUE KAHN
section_paragraph: I am a creative visualizer with 3 years of professional experience who transitioned into a full-stack web developer. My background in design helps me build visually appealing, user-friendly, and scalable web applications by combining strong aesthetics with modern frontend and backend development practices.

title: THE TECHNOLOGIES
section_paragraph: This section highlights the technologies, tools, and frameworks I use to design and develop modern web applications. From frontend libraries and backend frameworks to databases and design tools, these technologies help me create efficient, scalable, and visually polished digital solutions.

title: THE PROJECTS
section_paragraph: Here you'll find a selection of projects that demonstrate my skills in frontend and backend development, problem-solving, and UI design. Each project reflects real-world use cases, clean architecture, and thoughtful design decisions built using modern web technologies.

title: THE EXPERIENCES
section_paragraph: My professional experience includes working as a creative visualizer for 3 years and evolving into a web developer. This journey has strengthened my ability to blend design thinking with technical execution, allowing me to contribute effectively to both visual and functional aspects of web projects.

title: THE CONNECTIONS
section_paragraph: This page contains my contact information and ways to get in touch. Whether you want to discuss a project, collaboration, or opportunity, feel free to reach out. Iâ€™m always open to connecting and creating meaningful digital experiences together.
